dict.string: Something went wrong. '%ExecutingThisMacro%' was unable to determine the most recently executed macros.

set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE" tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" set kmUUID to getvariable "local_MreUUID" instance kmInst end tell tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" do script kmUUID end tell
Open the macro in the Keyboard Maestro editor

set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE" tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" set kmUUID to getvariable "local_MreUUID" instance kmInst end tell tell application "Keyboard Maestro" editMacro kmUUID end tell
